name: Target Switch
description:
A 2D target switching game.

Target Switch is  a 2D Top-Down-Shooter. Your mission is to complete tasks assigned to you by the organisation. Based on your success, you will be rewarded with reputation (rep). Earn enough rep and try and make it out alive.

Sound FXs sourced from https://opengameart.org/
Music by Joystock - https://www.joystock.org
